cyclone.name: ANA
cyclone.current_location: about 105 mi SSE of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to bend northwest then north, approaching the South-/North-Carolina coast Sunday and drifting inland before recurving northeast off the Mid-Atlantic early next week.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the coast between Myrtle Beach, SC and Cape Fear, NC

weather_observation.watch_coast: Edisto Beach SC to just south of South Santee River SC
weather_observation.warning_coast: South Santee River SC to Cape Lookout NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Coasts of South Carolina and North Carolina, with swell and rip-current impacts extending northward to Virginia
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at Boston, MA
weather_observation.rainfall: Only distant fringe showers possible; heavy rainfall not expected
